text: hello welcome to bbc world news
the metropolitan police are taking no

sex abuse allegations surrounding prince
andrew and jeffrey epstein virginia
dufres claimed she was trafficked to the

is still ongoing graham satchel reports
this is the now famous photograph of

this is mischief ray last year with her

child
the met police have conducted a series

when details of the civil case became

one is above the law now in a statement
the mets say they have concluded their

mr frey is alleged to have been
trafficked to the uk by the american
financial and sex offender jeffrey
epstein epstein took his own life in a

prince andrew were friends for a number
of years they've been previous reviews
into the allegations against prince
andrew and jeffrey epstein explaining
their decision to take no further action
in those cases the met said any
investigation into human trafficking
would be largely focused on activities
and relationships outside the uk
and that the metropolitan police service
was not the appropriate authority to
conduct inquiries in these
circumstances prince andrew has retired
from royal duties israeli seen in public
the outcome of this review means there's
no prospect of a formal criminal
investigation here in the uk but the
mets say they will continue to liaise

graeme satchel bbc news
